name: Dwarven Hot Cocoa Rescue
description:
Save the dwarven hot cocoa from the spirit who wants to take it all for themselves!

Controls: WASD to move Space to Dodge Shift Space to Jump Shift to Sprint Shethe/Draw Sword: R Key Middle Mouse button to Target Enemy Left mouse click: Light attacks Hold down Left Mouse: Charged Attack Sprint Attack: Left click while sprinting Heavy Attack: Right click while holding down Shift Right Mouse Button: Block with Shield

Controller Controls are on the pause screen.

Made for the December Game Jam Hosted by Neon Blue Studio.
